column1: Kata Robata////This place is AMAZING. It's a must try especially during the lunch
column2: where they have better deals. This place is tapa styled with mostly Japanese food. They sell a few Kobe beef dishes that are really good. The chicken skewers were my favorite because each of them were uniquely flavored
column3: which made it tasty and a fun experience. The ramen was okay. It's filling
column4: but I wouldn't have felt like I missed out if we didn't try it. Also
column5: be sure to ask for their real wasabi. It's $7
column6: but worth it because it tastes so distinctly different and fresher than the usual horseradish wasabi.
